instructions.original_text: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (232 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
instructions.notes: Preheat oven and prepare baking sheet.

instructions.original_text: Place squash halves cut-side down on a cutting board. Cut into 3/8-inch slices.
instructions.notes: Slice halves into 3/8-inch slices with cut-side down.

instructions.original_text: Transfer slices to a large bowl. Drizzle with olive oil; add salt and cayenne pepper. Toss until squash is well coated.
instructions.notes: Season and toss to coat evenly.

instructions.original_text: Arrange squash in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
instructions.notes: Avoid overlapping slices for even roasting.

instructions.original_text: Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms are browned and squash is tender, 12 to 18 minutes.
instructions.notes: Roast 12–18 minutes until browned and tender.
